metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21694 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymously share files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. The website mode of the onionshare allows to use a hardened CSP, which will block any scripts and external resources. It is not possible to configure this CSP for individual pages and therefore the security enhancement cannot be used for websites using javascript or external resources like fonts or images.

criterions.comment: onionshare: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
